   \]
3.

text:
Solving the system of equations:
   \[
   \begin{cases}
   2y + x = 180^\circ \\
   y + x = 110^\circ
   \end{cases}
   \]
   Subtract the second equation from the first:
   \[
   (2y + x) - (y + x) = 180^\circ - 110^\circ \implies y = 70^\circ
   \]
4.
